languages.text: Под укрытием, имитирующим сугроб, скрывается какой-то механизм. Вам не удалось к нему пробиться, но, похоже, удалось вывести из строя.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Вы что-то зацепили и маскировка спала, оказывается тут была туррель
Попытка вывести из строя скрытую турель удалась — страшное орудие не успело пробудится.

languages.text: There is some kind of mechanism hidden beneath the fake snowdrift. You were not able to reach it, but it seems you managed to put it out of action.
languages.original_text: Под укрытием, имитирующим сугроб, скрывается какой-то механизм. Вам не удалось к нему пробиться, но, похоже, удалось вывести из строя.

traits.locale_text: The attempt to disable the hidden turret was successful — the fearsome weapon did not even have time to activate.
There is some kind of mechanism hidden beneath the fake snowdrift. You were not able to reach it, but it seems you managed to put it out of action.
The attempt to disable the hidden turret was successful — the fearsome weapon did not even have time to activate.
There is some kind of mechanism hidden beneath the fake snowdrift. You were not able to reach it, but it seems you managed to put it out of action.
There is some kind of mechanism hidden beneath the fake snowdrift. You were not able to reach it, but it seems you managed to put it out of action.

languages.text: 这个假雪堆下面藏着某种装置。你无法接触到它，但你似乎成功地让它失效了。
languages.original_text: There is some kind of mechanism hidden beneath the fake snowdrift. You were not able to reach it, but it seems you managed to put it out of action.

traits.locale_text: 这个假雪堆下面藏着某种装置。你无法接触到它，但你似乎成功地让它失效了。

languages.text: Hay una especie de mecanismo escondido bajo el falso banco de nieve. Aunque no puedes acercarte a él, logras desactivarlo.
languages.original_text: There is some kind of mechanism hidden beneath the fake snowdrift. You were not able to reach it, but it seems you managed to put it out of action.

traits.locale_text: Hay una especie de mecanismo escondido bajo el falso banco de nieve. Aunque no puedes acercarte a él, logras desactivarlo.

languages.text: 作り物の雪の吹きだまりの下にはある種の仕掛けが隠されている。手を伸ばすことこそできなかったものの、なんとか機能停止させることができたようだ。
languages.original_text: There is some kind of mechanism hidden beneath the fake snowdrift. You were not able to reach it, but it seems you managed to put it out of action.

traits.locale_text: 作り物の雪の吹きだまりの下にはある種の仕掛けが隠されている。手を伸ばすことこそできなかったものの、なんとか機能停止させることができたようだ。

languages.text: Unter der falschen Schneeverwehung ist irgendein Mechanismus versteckt. Du konntest ihn nicht erreichen, hast ihn aber anscheinend außer Betrieb gesetzt.
languages.original_text: There is some kind of mechanism hidden beneath the fake snowdrift. You were not able to reach it, but it seems you managed to put it out of action.

traits.locale_text: Unter der falschen Schneeverwehung ist irgendein Mechanismus versteckt. Du konntest ihn nicht erreichen, hast ihn aber anscheinend außer Betrieb gesetzt.

languages.text: Une sorte de mécanisme est dissimulé sous la fausse congère. Vous n'êtes pas {mf|parvenu|parvenue} à l'atteindre, mais il semble que vous l'ayez tout de même mis hors service.
languages.original_text: There is some kind of mechanism hidden beneath the fake snowdrift. You were not able to reach it, but it seems you managed to put it out of action.

traits.locale_text: Une sorte de mécanisme est dissimulé sous la fausse congère. Vous n'êtes pas {mf|parvenu|parvenue} à l'atteindre, mais il semble que vous l'ayez tout de même mis hors service.

languages.text: Sahte kar yığınının altında bir tür mekanizma saklı. Görünüşe bakılırsa ulaşamasan da saf dışı etmeyi başarmışsın.
languages.original_text: There is some kind of mechanism hidden beneath the fake snowdrift. You were not able to reach it, but it seems you managed to put it out of action.
